title: GreenX wordmark visibility fixes + agri-tech banner imagery + role logos

requirements.summary: Ensure the GreenX wordmark renders fully and remains readable on Login, authenticated TopBar (primary background), and AdminLayout header in both light/dark modes while keeping it as styled text.
acceptanceCriteria: On the authenticated TopBar, both “Green” and “X” are clearly visible in light mode and dark mode.
On the Login page header and AdminLayout sidebar header, the wordmark still renders correctly and remains readable in light mode and dark mode.
The wordmark still renders as text (not an image), with “X” styled distinctly from “Green” as it is now.

file_operations.description: Update the wordmark styling so the “X” uses theme-aware text color (not hardcoded black) and add a supported variant for rendering on primary-colored backgrounds (e.g., TopBar) so “Green” does not disappear; keep the wordmark as text with distinct styling between “Green” and “X”.
Use the updated GreenXWordmark variant intended for primary-background contexts so “GreenX” stays readable on the primary-colored TopBar in both light and dark mode.
Ensure the AdminLayout sidebar header uses the updated GreenXWordmark behavior (no invisible letters, theme-aware colors) without changing existing admin protection, user info, or logout behavior.
Adjust/extend the existing wordmark shadow/readability styles if needed to preserve contrast in both light and dark modes, especially for the “X” on varying backgrounds.

requirements.summary: Introduce a reusable agri-tech banner component that displays a static illustration and render it near the top of each main role dashboard (Land Owner, Field Manager, Worker, Expert) under the TopBar without breaking layouts.
acceptanceCriteria: Land Owner, Field Manager, Worker, and Expert dashboards each display an agri-tech themed illustration/banner.
The images are served as static frontend assets (not fetched from the backend).
The banner scales responsively for the existing mobile-first layouts and does not overflow containers.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable responsive visual banner/hero illustration component that renders the static image at frontend/public/assets/generated/agri-tech-banner.dim_1200x400.png and fits within existing container widths without overflow.
Render the new AgriTechBanner component near the top of the Land Owner dashboard content (directly under TopBar) while preserving existing spacing and layout.
Render the new AgriTechBanner component near the top of the Field Manager dashboard content (directly under TopBar) without breaking existing mobile-first layout.
Render the new AgriTechBanner component near the top of the Worker dashboard content (directly under TopBar) while keeping task interactions unchanged.
Render the new AgriTechBanner component near the top of the Expert dashboard content (directly under TopBar) while keeping existing panels and actions unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add role-specific logos and show the correct logo for Land Owner, Worker, and Expert in a consistent TopBar location next to the GreenX wordmark without affecting user info or logout.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as Land Owner, the owner logo is visible on Land Owner pages.
When logged in as Worker, the worker logo is visible on Worker pages.
When logged in as Expert, the expert logo is visible on Expert pages.
Role logos render correctly in light mode and dark mode and do not overlap the title, user name, role label, or logout button.

file_operations.description: Create a small, reusable role-logo component that selects among static assets based on the current authenticated role (Land Owner/Worker/Expert) using frontend/public/assets/generated/role-owner-logo.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/role-worker-logo.dim_256x256.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/role-expert-logo.dim_256x256.png.

Add the role logo next to the GreenX wordmark (consistent placement) by using the new RoleLogo component and the session role from AuthProvider; keep the existing user name/role label and logout button behavior unchanged, and ensure the layout does not overlap in light/dark modes.

requirements.summary: Add the newly generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the UI references those exact filenames as static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All newly generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
All UI references to the new imagery use paths under /assets/generated/ (no backend image serving).

file_operations.description: Add the generated static banner image asset with the exact required filename for reuse in the AgriTechBanner component.
Add the generated static Owner role logo asset with the exact required filename for use in the TopBar role logo rendering.
Add the generated static Worker role logo asset with the exact required filename for use in the TopBar role logo rendering.
Add the generated static Expert role logo asset with the exact required filename for use in the TopBar role logo rendering.
Ensure the banner component references the exact static asset path/filename frontend/public/assets/generated/agri-tech-banner.dim_1200x400.png and does not rely on backend-fetched images.

Ensure the role logo component references the exact static asset paths/filenames frontend/public/assets/generated/role-owner-logo.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/role-worker-logo.dim_256x256.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/role-expert-logo.dim_256x256.png and does not rely on backend image serving.
